posts.post_content:

Dessau

F. Jones (Portrait)

McGlynn

Not looking for anything graded, just presentable Fair or Good condition in the $15-$20 range. Will pay a little more for non-common backs like PB or Sovereign if decent shape.

Also still looking for beaters/low-grade commons in the $10-$12 range for my second set. Only have about 60 of those so need almost everyone.
